name: SugarLand: The Invasion of the Savory Scoundrels
name_original: SugarLand: The Invasion of the Savory Scoundrels
description: Welcome to the magical land of SugarLand. The kingdom has been overrun with with the Savory Scoundrels led by their Leader: Dr. Pretzel. He will stop at nothing to destroy SugarLand and all that it stands for. Only Sir Raspberry Jerry can defeat him, save the kingdom, and rescue Princess SugarBerry.
